---
title: "/steal"

<!-- This file is generated by scripts/wiki/renderCommandsDoc.ts. -->

[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Sends your minion to steal to train Thieving.

**Usage**

- `/steal name:<string> [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The object you try to steal from. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity (defaults to max). | - |

**Examples**

- `/steal name:Man`
